person.persName: אבטולמוס So in the printed version to bBB 68a, This person was obviously not well known, and his name was not stable so that the scribes of the mss were not sure how to write it, see vol. 4, Introduction 5.1.1.2.1.1, pp. 23-4. For this form see vol. 1, under Eutolmus (3) G/M, p. 279. Perhaps this was his name, and אבשלום is a scribal “correction” see vol. 4, Introduction 2.7.2, p. 18.
/אבטלמס So in the Vatican 115 Ms to bBB 68a, see previous note. On the form אבטולמוס see previous note. On the fall of the וs see vol. 4, Introduction 2.3.5.4, p. 13.
/אבטלוס So in the Florence II-I-9 Ms to bBB 68a, see above, n. 3. For this form see vol. 1, under Eutolmus (2) G/M, p. 279.
/אבישלום So in the printed versions of bBer 7b, see above, n. 3. For this form see vol. 1, under Abshalom (6) B/M, p. 60.
